aboutCompany.sectionTitle: Specializing in transportation of freight in all 48 states
aboutCompany.desc: Our main goal is to establish long term relationships with our clients and we are achieving it by providing the best services in transportation, including long haul and dedicated freight. Whether you are interested in driving solo or as a team, OTR or dedicated regional route, independent contractor - we have open positions for you!

aboutCompanyTwo.sectionTitle:
A secure job, new truck,
and good pay are guaranteed!
aboutCompanyTwo.heading: States covered
aboutCompanyTwo.desc: At Prime Express, INC our mission is to attract and retain customers by providing the best in class transportation solutions, including long haul and dedicated freight. Drivers are our most valuable assets. Apply for a job now, it only takes minutes.

aboutItems.heading: What we can do?
aboutItems.desc: We put a strong focus on the needs of your business to figure out solutions that best fits your demand and nail it.

aboutItems.heading: Become our partners?
aboutItems.desc: Our preventive and progressive approach will help you take the lead while addressing possible threats in managing data.

aboutItems.heading: Need a hand?
aboutItems.desc: Our support team is available 24/7 a day, 7 days a week and can get ready for solving any of your situational rising problems.

aboutDelivery.sectionTitle:
We excel in delivering
optimal solutions.

deliveryItems.title: Warranty Management IT
deliveryItems.desc: Our service offerings enhance customer experience throughout secure & highly functional end-to-end warranty management.

deliveryItems.title: Product Engineering & Services
deliveryItems.desc: Develop and propose product improvements through periodical and accurate testing, repairing & refining every version.

deliveryItems.title: Quality Control System
deliveryItems.desc: It's more than a responsibility but a guarantee from us to gain customer trust with highly reliable quality control system.

deliveryItems.title: Infrastructure Integration Technology
deliveryItems.desc: At Prime Express, INC, we have a holistic and integrated approach towards core modernization to experience technological evolution.

deliveryItems.title: Highly Professional Staffs
deliveryItems.desc: Having obtained the official & formal training in IT technology and technical fields, our staffs know more than what they show.

deliveryItems.title: Information Security Management
deliveryItems.desc: Information security has been a rising issue lately due to a series of scandals from big companies, rest assured, we're here.
